title: Karagoli Lake
about: Lake Karagoli is located in Kvemo Kartli region, in Dmanisi Municipality, on Gomareti Plateau, 1560 meters above from the sea level. A small lake surrounded by open spaces and beautiful fields creates a wonderful sight. Next to this Lake, there are two other lakes - Lailagioli and Tambulgioli. There are also other lakes in this area, called Kainegoli and Chamligoli. The lakes are so close with each other, that you can visit all of them in a short time. Stunning views, blue mountains, meadows and lush lakes give the visitors the picturesque landscape. If you love nature and traveling, Lake Karagoli is a great place to relax and enjoy with friends.
